embed.description: ( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle! Manage your expectations accordingly.) Warring Kingdoms Azir's now holds a fan during his taunt.

replies.body:
200 / 400 / 600 > 150 / 300 / 450

Doesn't seem like that much of a nerf when you actually look at what it is on live.

Especially considering it still scales off AD.
